description:
Well visits the church where Cardinal Hohenheim introduces his granddaughter, Elise. Thanks to the Cardinal`s clever manipulation of their conversation, Well is soon engaged to Elise, but he finds himself conflicted at the way all these nobles view political marriage as the natural course of things. Though Well isn`t entirely opposed to being with Elise, who`s known as "Saint" Hohenheim...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Political Marriage?! Are You Kidding Me?!
Un mariage arrangé ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
政略結婚って, それはないでしょう!
